channel.title: Lunr on Henrik Sommerfeld's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Lunr on Henrik Sommerfeld's blog

item.title: Search for Static Website Without External Service
item.description: When you have a static website, there are a few things that you usually don’t have out-of-the-box. One such thing is search. You can argue that you don’t need it, but if you want it and your site isn’t that large, I’ll describe how I’ve set it up without an external service.
